commit.message:
[Qt] move helpmessage from debug window to main menu

- the option to show our help message dialog resides now in main menu
  under help

files.patch:
@@ -339,32 +339,6 @@
         </widget>
        </item>

-           <bold>true</bold>
-          </font>
-         </property>

-          <string>Command-line options</string>
